data.text:
@muzzlefreemadam @DanielAndrewsMP Thank you. This is enough info for me.
Just an indication.
@NickSchwanck @DanielAndrewsMP The pair on the left are A3 canvasses, Top right is 3 x A4. I’ll get back to you on the bottom right canvas. It’s bigger. 👍🏻
@muzzlefreemadam @DanielAndrewsMP Can you please tell me approximately how big these are?
@muzzlefreemadam @DanielAndrewsMP Amazing stuff. It's so great to see work by other artists. I hope he keeps it up.

@NickSchwanck @DanielAndrewsMP Thanks Nick.❤️It’s become a collection. The first 3 are based on Melbourne. The 4th sits on a turntable and rotates to show the impact of humanity on the earth. All oil paintings. They are glorious to behold. 
They’d make an excellent tram art choice, https://t.co/RuSz82HYi0
@BevJohnst @DanielAndrewsMP Yes. He’s at a select Arts school now - is loving it!

@muzzlefreemadam @DanielAndrewsMP That's absolutely beautiful! I love colour too. 
Wow, what a talent!
